name: Push-ups
description: A basic upper-body strength exercise.
instructions: Start in a high plank position, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, then push back up.

name: Squats
description: A lower-body exercise that strengthens the legs and glutes.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back, then return to standing.

name: Pull-ups
description: An upper-body exercise targeting the back and arms.
instructions: Grip a pull-up bar with palms facing forward, pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar, then lower yourself down.

name: Lunges
description: A single-leg strength exercise.
instructions: Step forward with one leg, lower your hips until both knees are at a 90-degree angle, then push back up to the starting position.

name: Deadlifts
description: A compound strength exercise for the posterior chain.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, grip a barbell, hinge at your hips, keep your back straight, lift the bar to hip height, then lower it back down.

name: Bench Press
description: A strength exercise for the chest and upper body.
instructions: Lie on a bench, grip a barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width, lower the bar to your chest, then press it back up.

name: Plank
description: A core stabilization exercise.
instructions: Hold a push-up position with your elbows on the ground, keeping your body in a straight line.

name: Bicep Curls
description: An isolation exercise for the arms.
instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing up, curl the weights towards your shoulders, then lower them slowly.

name: Overhead Shoulder Press
description: A compound movement for shoulder strength.
instructions: Hold dumbbells or a barbell at shoulder height, press them overhead, then lower them back to the starting position.

name: Russian Twists
description: A core rotation exercise.
instructions: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, twist your torso from side to side while holding a weight or medicine ball.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body cardio and strength movement.
instructions: Squat down, kick your legs back into a push-up position, return to squat, then jump up explosively.

name: Jump Rope
description: A cardio exercise for endurance and agility.
instructions: Hold a jump rope, swing it around your body, and jump over it continuously.

name: Triceps Dips
description: An exercise for the back of the arms.
instructions: Sit on the edge of a bench, place hands beside your hips, lower your body by bending your elbows, then push back up.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic core and cardio exercise.
instructions: Start in a plank position, quickly alternate bringing knees to chest in a running motion.

name: Box Jumps
description: An explosive plyometric movement.
instructions: Stand in front of a box, jump onto it using both feet, then step or jump down.

name: Leg Press
description: A lower-body strength exercise using a machine.
instructions: Sit on the leg press machine, push the platform away with your legs, then return slowly.

name: Seated Row
description: A pulling movement for the upper back.
instructions: Sit at a row machine, pull the handle towards your torso, then slowly return to the starting position.

name: Calf Raises
description: A lower leg strengthening exercise.
instructions: Stand on the edge of a step, push through the balls of your feet to raise your body, then lower slowly.

name: Face Pulls
description: A shoulder stability and posture exercise.
instructions: Use a cable machine, pull the rope towards your face, keeping your elbows high.

name: Side Plank
description: A core stabilization exercise targeting the obliques.
instructions: Lie on your side, support yourself on one elbow, keep your body straight, and hold the position.
